titles.title: A bill for the relief of Space Systems Laboratories, Incorporated, of Melbourne, Florida.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 2/9/1988--Introduced. Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named Florida corporation in full satisfaction of all claims against the United States arising out of the loss of profits from the wrongful denial of certain Army contracts.
